name: UFO INVASION (BMINCS)
description:
For the Game Jam: [Mini Jam 91: UFO]

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-91-ufo

WASD and Arrow keys to move

 Use your mouse to spin the rocket around

Collect satellites to gain points 

Click on the Ufo to defeat the aliens 

You have 3 lives the aliens have 8 lives

Good luck!
